content: this very basic pattern includes 5 sizes from child to adult large pattern notes include hints & tips on sizing this hat for other gauges & a handy guide for industry standard hat sizes to help you fit everyone on your list hat is worked in the round & the edges are finished in single_crochet with a braided tassel & tie option so some skills other than knitting are required for right now this is an exclusive free ravelry download will also be available on the wildwest woolies website soon
